title: How to Fly in Super Mario World

steps.title: Finish the first castle in the game.
steps.content: Finish the first castle in the game. The cape feather that enables you to fly is not accessible until you have finished the first castle and are at the level titled Donut Plains 1.

steps.title: Acquire the feather.
steps.content: Acquire the feather. This can be done via a question mark box or stomping on a flying Koopa with a flashing cape.

steps.title: Find an empty stretch of flat land.
steps.content: Find an empty stretch of flat land. Run along it, using the right arrow and the Y button, until Mario swings his arms open.

steps.title: Press the B button to jump.
steps.content: Press the B button to jump. Continue holding down the Y button.

steps.title: Press the arrow button of the opposite direction you're heading in.
steps.content: Press the arrow button of the opposite direction you're heading in. If you are heading to the right, use the left arrow. If you are heading to the left, use the right arrow. Tap it every second or two, while continuing to hold down the Y button.
